attributes.action: Request for Investigation of Benazir Bhutto Cowardly Killing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir

with great respect i Shakil-Ur-Rahman being a pakistani citizen requesting you as common citizen of my country not on the platform of Pakistan Pepole Party to kindly 
1) request the pakistani govt.,or
2)put some pressure on them to kindly allow UK govt investigation authorities to conduct the investigation in the killing of not just a great leader Benazir Bhutto but she was a great mother of the pakistani nation,great sister of the pakistani nation,great friend of the pakistani nation and a great leader of poor people specially.
I am requesting you with great respect to kindly give hand to our nation in this difficult/bad time and try your best in this regard. I will be very thankful and grateful to you.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
